properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 3 at 2:58AM MST until January 5 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Livingston Area and Beartooth Foothills.

* WHEN...From this morning to 5 AM MST Sunday. Strongest winds
will occur this afternoon through Saturday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong crosswinds will make travel very difficult for
all vehicles along I-90 from Springdale through Livingston, and
on roads near Nye.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST SUNDAY
